page.title: 15Employment in Rawdon
page.content: We studied 7 companies we thought representative of the area,employing about 1000 people altogether,approx. 25% of whom were{skilled craftsmen}eg electricians,printers;over 70% were { {semi-skilled}(trained for a specific job in the factory) and only a few unskilled doing jobs like cleaning. A questionaire we sent out showed very little unemployment in Rawdon, with over three times as many people describing their jobs as providing a service rather than helping to produce goods.In a majority of families both father and mother work outside the home,both travelling to work by car.{A {typical mother}might work part-time near home,for the local authority as a teacher,nurse or office worker.A{ {typical father}would work full-time, further afield,for a private employer in an office,or be self-employed.
